sourcesContent: import { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react' import { Row, Col, CardText } from 'reactstrap' import Prism from 'prismjs' import BreadCrumbs from '@components/breadcrumbs' import Card from '@components/card-snippet' import MediaLeft from './MediaLeft' import MediaRight from './MediaRight' import MediaLeftBordered from './MediaLeftBordered' import MediaRightBordered from './MediaRightBordered' import MediaNested from './MediaNested' import MediaAlignment from './MediaAlignment' import { mediaAlignment, mediaLeft, mediaLeftBordered, mediaNested, mediaRight, mediaRightBordered } from './MediaObjectSourceCode' const MediaObject = () => { useEffect(() => { Prism.highlightAll() }, []) return ( Use left prop with media tag to align you media to left. Use right prop with media tag to align you media to right. Wrap your medias with .media-bordered to create a bordered media. Wrap your medias with .media-bordered to create a bordered media. Add an extra media inside of your MediaBody to create a nested media. Use .align-self-[center/end] classes to vertically align your media ) } export default MediaObject
